# WKInterfaceAuthorizationAppleIDButton.Style.default

**Case**

The system’s default button style.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Styles

- **WKInterfaceAuthorizationAppleIDButton.Style.white**: A white button with black lettering.
- **WKInterfaceAuthorizationAppleIDButton.Style.white**: A white button with black lettering.
